hero.title: FR RAP OPENDATA
hero.subtitle: Who's the best rapper? The algorithm decides.

tooltips.commercial: Spotify listeners + YouTube views + SNEP certifications. Pre-2010 artists get a ×1.5 bonus (physical era was harder).
tooltips.longevity: Career duration since first album. Bonus for each complete decade of activity.
tooltips.technique: Unique vocabulary (via NLP) + Flow score. Analyzed on 50 songs per artist via Genius API.
tooltips.quotability: Punchline score + Hook quality. Detected by NLP patterns and repetitions.
tooltips.influence: Influence score + Wikipedia mentions + Awards. Legends get a ×1.4 legacy bonus.
tooltips.vision: Thematic coherence + Artistic integrity. Measures the consistency of the creative universe.
tooltips.excellence: Best album score + Number of classics. Rewards peaks of excellence, not averages.
tooltips.innovation: Creation of new sound/genre. Measures originality and contribution to French rap.

algorithm.title: The Algorithm
algorithm.subtitle: How we rank French rappers
algorithm.impactDesc: Releasing 20 average albums isn't worth one masterpiece. We measure excellence, not prolificacy.
algorithm.balanceDesc: 40% artistic (technique, vision, innovation) and 40% commercial/influence. Both matter.
algorithm.realDataDesc: No opinions: we analyze actual lyrics via NLP and real streaming numbers.
algorithm.notPenalizeFeatures: Penalize artists who do few features (e.g., PNL)
algorithm.notDoubleCount: Count the same metric twice (double counting)
algorithm.notIgnoreLegends: Ignore legends with less streaming presence
algorithm.geniusDesc: Lyrics from 50 songs per artist analyzed via a French NLP pipeline.
algorithm.streamingDesc: Spotify listeners, YouTube views, SNEP certifications based on public sources.
algorithm.editorialDesc: Influence, innovation, artistic vision scores established by calibrated expert analysis.
algorithm.pillarsSubtitle: Each artist is evaluated on 8 complementary dimensions
algorithm.nlpSubtitle: Natural Language Processing applied to rap lyrics
algorithm.nlpExplanation: Natural Language Processing enables computers to understand and analyze human text. For rap lyrics, we use NLP to objectively measure vocabulary richness, rhyme quality, and text structure.
algorithm.slangDesc: French rap heavily uses verlan (syllable inversion) and urban slang. Our pipeline normalizes these terms for accurate unique vocabulary counting.
algorithm.benchmarksSubtitle: Each metric is normalized (0-100) against these references

detector.title: Punchline Detector
detector.subtitle: Test the power of your lyrics with our AI
detector.placeholder:
Enter your lyrics here...

I'm not a rapper, I'm a problem
My texts are weapons, my words are poems
